turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a cafe mocha tall with extra mocha and whip cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you may and can I ask which store you would like to pick up your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On Rt 31 McHenry IL

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great is there anything else you would like, we have a great selection at the bakery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I am good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We also have a buy one get one free breakfast meal today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's on the menu?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have Ham and cheese Croissant and Bacon-gouda-breakfast is great

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No how about do you have any wraps

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a Spinach, Feta & Cage Free Egg White Breakfast Wrap which is delicious

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow that sounds good please add to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great is there anything else that I can get you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think I am good for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great your order will be ready in 10 minutes unless you have a specific time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make that in 20 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure I can.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great so you want a cafe mocha tall with extra mocha and whip cream and Spinach, Feta & Cage Free Egg White Breakfast Wrap. Did you want regular milk with that and any other flavor.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk would be great and no extra flavors

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great we will see you in 20 minutes.
